text: 8:38 Matyu 10:33; Luk 9:26; Rom 1:16; 2 Timoti 1:8Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn itir gumazamiziba me God akɨrim ragha a gasaragha arazir kurabagh ami. Men tina nan ziam ko nan Akar Aghuimɨn gun mɨkɨman aghumsɨghtɨ, gɨn Gumazamizibar Otarim uan afeziamɨn boroghɨn ikeghɨva Godɨn damazimɨn zuezir enselba koma Godɨn angazangarim sara izighirɨ, uaghan men aghumsɨgham.”
